MCP Agent Mail CLI (Rust)

Usage: am <COMMAND>

Commands:
  serve-http
  serve-stdio
  lint
  typecheck
  share
  archive
  guard
  file_reservations
  acks
  list-acks
  migrate
  list-projects
  clear-and-reset-everything
  config
  amctl
  am-run
  projects
  mail
  products
  docs
  doctor
  help                        Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)

Options:
  -h, --help     Print help
  -V, --version  Print version
